      • PottsCell2D

        public PottsCell2D(int id,
                   int pop,
                   Cell.State state,
                   int age,
                   Location location,
                   boolean hasTags,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double> criticals,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double> lambdas,
                   double[] adhesion,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Cell.Tag,java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double>> criticalsTag,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Cell.Tag,java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double>> lambdasTag,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Cell.Tag,java.util.EnumMap<Cell.Tag,java.lang.Double>> adhesionTag)
        Creates a PottsCell agent for 2D simulations.
        Parameters:
        id - the cell ID
        pop - the cell population index
        state - the cell state
        age - the cell age (in ticks)
        location - the Location of the cell
        criticals - the map of critical values
        lambdas - the map of lambda multipliers
        adhesion - the list of adhesion values
        hasTags - true if the cell has tags, false otherwise
        criticalsTag - the map of tagged critical values
        lambdasTag - the map of tagged lambda multipliers
        adhesionTag - the map of tagged adhesion values

      • PottsCell2D

        public PottsCell2D(int id,
                   int pop,
                   Location location,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double> criticals,
                   java.util.EnumMap<Potts.Term,java.lang.Double> lambdas,
                   double[] adhesion)
        Creates a PottsCell agent for 2D simulations.

        The default state is proliferative and age is 0. The cell is created with no tags.

        Parameters:
        id - the cell ID
        pop - the cell population index
        location - the Location of the cell
        criticals - the map of critical values
        lambdas - the map of lambda multipliers
        adhesion - the list of adhesion values
